reviews.review: O modo campanha é uma delícia.

Cool Vintage game. I love it.

CS-CZ jest lepszą pod względem graficznym odpowiednikiem kultowego CS 1.6. Ponadto jak kupimy grę dostajemy odrazu Counter Strike Condition Zero Delted Scenes który jest taką historią w cs-ie. ta wersja posiada również bardziej rozbudowany model gry z botami poprzez dodanie misji w których wybieramy sobię drużynę składaącą się z botów i przechodzimy na coraz to inne mapy, za przejście danje mapy dostajemy punkty za które możemy wybierać członków drużyny.
Bu oyunda Speedrun yapmak niye bu kadar zor yaw

One of the best CS games. I spent most of my childhood on this game, definitely recommended. The missions pack is just perfection I really enjoyed the Tour of Duty and I have completed it many times because it was fun and challenging. Panther is a pain... Maverick is probably the best... damn so many memories with these bots...

I played CS:CZ after very long time and I didnt regret it :D I heard that people really disliked or even hated this game and I am absolutely not surprised . Counter-Strike: Condition Zero didnt even have to exist . This game is just some kind of a ,,MOD´´ for Counter-Strike 1.6 :D It has maps from 1.6 and also some more maps I guess , but they are just more detailed with better looking textures , a little different movement mechanics and also some completely useless additions to them like ( random crates , boxes etc. ) on many places . I was just shocked that people still play this game , even on STEAM :D As I wrote before , this game didnt even have to exist but ... it does :D  and it will be a part of CS Franchise forever , even when it is completely dumb and weird . If you want to just goof around with your friends even alone , I highly recommend this game to you . Oh , and don´t worry , this game plays good , it is just a Counter-Strike game ;)
